CustomField.description: If this box is checked, any products that have been added directly to the opportunity will not be removed when syncing a quote. If this box is unchecked, the products on the opportunity will always be an exact match of the products on the primary quote.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If this box is checked, any products that have been added directly to the opportunity will not be removed when syncing a quote. If this box is unchecked, the products on the opportunity will always be an exact match of the products on the primary quote.
CustomField.label: Preserve Ad Hoc Products
